Caption: Dr. Heinrich Luebke addresses the audience.
Description: From left: Prof. B. Sengupto, Mr. Raja Gopalan, Mr. Y.S. Ramaswami and Mr. R. Natarajan at the event. In his address, Dr. Heinrich Luebke stressed on the success that was born out of the co-operation between the two countries and their governments. He quoted a line by Mahatma Gandhi 'Knowledge will be the common property of the people', and went on to say that "The stone which I now have the honour to lay should be a constant reminder of this task to us and to all who teach and study in this Institute."
